item.title: Setting up this website
item.description: 1 Setting up a blogdown repository 2 Blogdown-ing with a different Hugo theme 3 Making a new homepage template 3.1 Understanding Hugo’s expected structure 4 Hooking it into the interwebs 4.1 Syncing public files to GitHub Pages 4.2 Re-pointing my old Squarespace domain name 5 Adding a photo gallery into the theme 6 Fixing code syntax highlighting 6.1 Updating RStudio’s pandoc installation 6.
